Package game.dinosaurs

Class RechargeSkillBehaviour

java.lang.Object
game.dinosaurs.RechargeSkillBehaviour
All Implemented Interfaces:
Behaviour
public class RechargeSkillBehaviour
extends java.lang.Object
implements Behaviour
Represents the behaviour where the Dinosaur goes to a predefined Ground, to recharge its skills (represented by capabilities).

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) java.lang.Enum<?> actorSkill
    The skill that needs to be recharged
    (package private) java.lang.Enum<?> groundIdentifier
    The identifier used to identify the Ground that can be used to recharge the skill

  • Method Details

    • getAction

      public Action getAction​(Dinosaur dinosaur, GameMap map)
      If the dinosaur already has the skill (i.e. no recharging required), returns null. Otherwise, call FollowBehaviour to close in on the target Ground.
      Specified by:
      getAction in interface Behaviour
      Parameters:
      dinosaur - the Actor acting
      map - the GameMap containing the Actor
      Returns:
      Null if dinosaur has the skill or no location with groundIdentifier capability found. Otherwise, uses MoveActorAction to approach the target Ground.
